trans-unit.source: Establishes an inline editor for the updating of property values.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un editor inline per l'aggiornamento dei valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This class can hold a single <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>: one for an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> editor.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe può contenere un unico <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>: uno per un <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode>editor.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Inline editing refers to the entering of property values into a text box or similar control as opposed to setting the value by choosing it from a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: Per modifica inline si intende l'immissione dei valori delle proprietà in una casella di testo o un controllo simile in contrapposizione all'impostazione il valore scegliendolo da un menu a discesa.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class as the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.InlineEditorTemplate*>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe come specificata <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.InlineEditorTemplate*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.InlineEditorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used to create the new property value editor.
trans-unit.target: L'editor inline <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per creare la nuova proprietà editor dei valori.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> be used to change a property value.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> per definire che un determinato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> utilizzabile per modificare un valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> per il quale creare il nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type be used to change a property value.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> per definire che un determinato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> tipo utilizzato per modificare un valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> tipo per cui creare il nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type.
Gets or sets the InlineEditorTemplate, the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used for an inline editor.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il InlineEditorTemplate, il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per un editor inline.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> has its <xref:System.Windows.DataContext> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that represents an inline editor.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> che rappresenta un editor inline.
